类 GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.GameController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
    直接已知子类:
    GameLabyrinth

    public abstract class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    Indispensable element in GUI design which takes charge of reception of all input by users.

    • 字段概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GameController

        public GameController(java.lang.String name,
                      int gameWidth,
                      int gameHeight,
                      int blockWidth,
                      int blockHeight)
        Constructor:
        参数:
        name - The game name to be displayed at the top of the window.
        gameWidth - The width of the game in blocks.
        gameHeight - The height of the game in blocks.
        blockWidth - The width in pixel of a screen block.
        blockHeight - The height in pixel of a screen block.

    • 方法详细资料

        public final void notify(GameModel gameModel)
        To notify the game frame that we have a modified gameModel:
        参数:
        gameModel - The modified gameModel.

      • getGameX

        public final int getGameX(int x)
        Gets the X block rank according to the X screen coordinate:
        参数:
        x - The X screen coordinate.
        返回:
        The X block rank of the clicked block.
